text: Bullia mauritiana, the Mauritius bullia, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The shell size varies between 30 mm and 75 mm ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the Indian Ocean along Madagascar and South Africa ==References== * Dautzenberg, Ph. (1929). Mollusques testacés marins de Madagascar. Faune des Colonies Francaises, Tome III ==External links== * Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1839
title: Bullia mauritiana
